name: Midway Arcade Treasures 3
overview: This is third Midway Arcade Treasures compilation released in as many years. This collection focuses on Midway and Atari racing games from the 1990s. The games in this collection include: • San Francisco Rush: The Rock Alcatraz Edition • Hydro Thunder • Super Off Road • Badlands • Race Drivin' • S.T.U.N. Runner • San Francisco Rush 2049 • Offroad Thunder Some of the games in this collection are based on the home conversions, rather than emulation of the arcade originals.
